title: power_outage
description: A facility-wide power outage interrupts critical systems.

timeline.title: Power Loss
timeline.description: Main power fails across multiple floors. Emergency lighting activated automatically.

timeline.title: Emergency Lighting Engaged
timeline.description: Battery-powered emergency lights operational. Account for all personnel in affected areas.

timeline.title: Generator Activation
timeline.description: Backup generator engaged but capacity is limited. Prioritize critical systems only.

timeline.title: Load Prioritization
timeline.description: Identify and power essential life safety systems, communications, and security equipment.

timeline.title: System Stabilization
timeline.description: Generator running stable. Monitor fuel levels and coordinate with utility company on restoration ETA.

timeline.title: Grid Power Restoration
timeline.description: Utility power restored. Gradually transfer load back to main grid and secure generator.
